all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore, be faithful; stand in the office which I have appointed unto you; succor the weak, lift up the hands which hang down, and strengthen the feeble knees.
Doctrine and Covenants 81:5
Quote of the Day
"Seek to understand the opportunity to link everything we do with our love for the Savior."
Elder Ricardo P. Giménez | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
